Name: Hercules Starlifter Flight Jacket
Description:
Carrying Capacity: 2K ÂµSCU

A flight jacket dedicated to the Hercules Starlifter and its ability to handle more than twelve labors. Made from synthetic leather, the jacket is styled with two front pockets, a ribbed waistband and cuffs to guarantee a good fit. The front features a Crusader logo while the back sports the ship serenely soaring through the clouds.
